chara.textHome:
Tsukasa is shopping,
so for now I am by myself.

Ocean and beach goods are cheap here,
so she ran right over to buy her fill.
*Sigh*

The sea is so quiet this early.
All you can hear is the crashing
of the waves...
I never knew it could be so soothing.
*Munch* *Giggle*
Tsukasa is so good at cooking.
This fish she whipped up is divine!

I feel like I should be hard at work right now.
Of course, I cannot train here...

One must do all things properly,
even relaxation!

I knew we'd see each other today, too,
but talking with Tsukasa is just so fun...
We stayed up so late into the night...
I'm not especially skilled at swimming.

But I do know a little, as befitting my position
as a daughter of a Mizuna family...
A Witch appeared in the ocean?
I-I'll call Tsukasa... No, never mind.
I can handle one this alone.
I'll take care of it right away!
*Sigh* It's so hot...
But I must persevere!

Even if I have heard that Endless Mirrors
is quite cool inside...

Are you making good progress with
your summer assignments, Tsukasa?
*Sigh*

Sorry, I know I tend to worry
about you too much.

I'm fine with ghost stories, but if someone
is telling them in person I get so scared...
Y-you think I'm contradicting myself?!

My koto club's competition is
a prized summer memory.

Ordinarily we'd be training hard to win,
but today is a day to take it easy.

*Sigh*
Breaking away from my usual hectic life,
making time to relax... Hm?!
Is this what resorts are truly for?

I unwittingly told the school nurse that
I was going to the beach with my sister.
That just proves how excited I was about it.

That couple standing on the beach
seems rather close, don't they?
I wonder if my parents once were ever—
No, no, never mind.
Oh!

Goodness, Mifuyu looked
so great in her swimsuit!

I wonder if I'll look as mature
as her next year?
I learned something!

I slept by Tsukasa's side and when I woke,
I noticed she sleeps in the same pose I do!
That's twins for you.
*Giggle*
Tsukasa looks so pretty in this photo.
And this one too!
*Chuckle*
I've gained quite a few new treasures.
